p:
Crystal plasticity was implemented using a user material subroutine (UMAT) that shares data between gauss points using a common block. The UMAT code is based on the user element (UEL) originally developed by Dunne et al.
73 . Detailed description of this can be found elsewhere
34 . Briefly, a physically based slip law
73 was used to approximate the crystallographic slip rate

λ , the resolved shear stress on slip system λ is less than τ
